input: text: Digital marketing leverages online platforms to reach audiences. Strategies include SEO, social media, and email campaigns. Effective marketing drives business growth.
coverage:

validityText:
The input begins with "Input: text:" which is not part of the paragraph of text specified. The specification requires a single string containing a paragraph composed of at least three sentences, each ending with a period, exclamation mark, or question mark. The prefix "Input: text:" violates the requirement by introducing additional content outside the paragraph structure.

ERR
